location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 30/53 'Persian Gulf: Seizure of a Koweiti Dhow in the Shatt-al-Arab, by Persian Customs Officials'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 122; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between British officials concerning an incident in which a Kuwaiti dhow owned by Haji Mahomed Hussein was seized by the Government of Iran's customs authorities. In addition to this correspondence, the file also contains statements made by two crew members of the dhow (folios 113-114).The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
